trans-unit.source: Obtains the file locations of Web services discovery documents for use in populating another Web services discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Web 服务发现文档的文件位置以用于填充其他 Web 服务发现文档。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentSearchPattern> class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern> class and is employed by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method, which handles an HTTP request for a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentSearchPattern>从抽象类继承<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern>类并且由<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler>类的<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>方法，处理发现文档的 HTTP 请求。

trans-unit.source: Normally, none of these classes need to be used directly by a developer.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，这些类都需要由开发人员直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentSearchPattern" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentSearchPattern" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The file system path of the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 发现文档的文件系统路径。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference" /> object for a given discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定发现文档的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference" /> object that specifies the location of a .vsdisco file.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference" /> 对象，该对象指定 .vsdisco 文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: The concrete <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference> class.

A <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> instance contains the location of the .vsdisco file, which is also the file system directory corresponding to the HTTP request passed to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference>实例包含.vsdisco 文件，这也是该文件的位置对应于 HTTP 请求的系统目录传递给<xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the file name pattern to use as a search target.
trans-unit.target: 获取用作搜索目标的文件名模式。

trans-unit.source: The pattern "*.vsdisco" indicates a .vsdisco Web services discovery document extension.
trans-unit.target: 模式"*.vsdisco"指示.vsdisco Web 服务发现文档扩展。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentLinksPattern> class, on the other hand, indicates a .disco extension.
